title: The Fear
description: They all had nightmares. They all had lost someone. Some of them had lost everyone. The sickness struck everyone over fourteen. First it twisted their minds. Next it ravaged their bodies. Now they roam the streets -crazed and hungry. The uninfected hide across London. Landmarks have become camps and gangs roam the streets, fighting the Enemy - and each other.But DogNut is determined to track down his friends and he sets off on a dangerous journey from the Tower to Buckingham Palace. He can't know that his next move will effect every other survivor in the city. He, alone, cannot stop the fear from spreading...
author: Charlie Higson
